containerVersion.name: JY/co Gold Package v1.0
containerVersion.description: Complete GA4 ecommerce tracking for Shopify - JY/co Gold Package

parameter.value:
<script>
  // JY/co Pixel Bridge - Listen for postMessage from Custom Pixel
  window.addEventListener('message', function(e) {
    if (e.data && e.data.type === 'jyco_datalayer') {
      window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
      window.dataLayer.push(e.data.payload);
      console.log('[JY/co Pixel Bridge] Event received:', e.data.payload.event);
    }
    
    if (e.data && e.data.type === 'jyco_pixel_ready') {
      console.log('[JY/co Pixel Bridge] Custom Pixel ready, version:', e.data.version);
    }
  });
</script>
